1)Ask me no questions and I'll tell you no lies.  

If all your stats except for experience level reaches the maximum (32767) and your experience level is 446 or higher, you'll have 
negative values for health.  And no, at that point you can't buy enough experience points to bring your health to a positive value without 
crashing the game.  

Right now, I haven't worked out how high your experience level can be where you can have max stats on everything else without 
having negative health values.
